title: Please create an fix for Android os to remove black bars in apps on pixel 4a, allow for fullscreen.
content: Some games have a black bar on the side making the game not centered and off to the side, some video streaming apps have a black bar on one side offsetting the video, even the Google phone app has a black bar on top while making a call.  Please add an option to Android to allow to force all apps to appear fullscreen with no black bar on the top of the screen while in portrait or the side in landscape mode.
